mainContent.heading: What is the Countdown Timer Section?
paragraphs: The Countdown Timer section is a focused Shopify section designed to display time-sensitive messages in a clear and visually balanced layout.
It helps create urgency for sales, promotions, and limited-time offers by showing a live countdown that encourages faster customer action.
The section integrates smoothly into product pages, landing pages, or promotional layouts without overwhelming the overall storefront design.

features.title: Detailed Styling

features.title: Color Control
features.description: Independently customize colors for headings, buttons, and countdown elements.

features.title: Countdown Functionality
features.description: Set the countdown date, labels, placement, and messaging to match your campaign.

features.title: Background Styling
features.description: Choose from images, solid colors, or gradient backgrounds to align with your brand.
